data.prayer: Please, teach the 8,221 believers in Huelva, Andalucía, Spain how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huelva, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Huelva, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Huelva who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, move the 8,221 believers in the county of Huelva to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Persian people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 388,687 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, help the 8,221 believers in Huelva to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Huelva, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
